questions.prompt: Fill the keyword used before a declaration to make it a named export:
questions.explanation: Named exports use export before declarations, e.g. export let apiKey = '...'

questions.prompt: To export a default value you use two words (lowercase, space separated). Fill them:
questions.explanation: Default exports use export default value;. Only one default per file.

questions.prompt: What two characters are used to import named exports? (type exactly):
questions.explanation: Named imports use curly braces: import { apiKey } from './util.js';
